project_name: OCR Read Using LLM for Readability and Understanding
description: The project utilized large language models (LLMs) for Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to extract and structure menu data from images. The task also involved addressing Turkish special character encoding issues and ensuring data was output in a structured JSON format.

technologies_used.name: Amazon Bedrock
technologies_used.description: AWS service for model interaction, used to send images to the Claude 3 Haiku model for text interpretation.

technologies_used.name: Claude 3 Haiku
technologies_used.description: Large language model used for understanding and structuring menu data from images.

technologies_used.name: Python
technologies_used.description: Programming language used for automating the encoding of images, model interaction, and processing of responses.

technologies_used.name: JSON
technologies_used.description: Data format for structuring and saving the menu data.

technologies_used.name: Base64
technologies_used.description: Encoding method used for converting images to a format suitable for model input.

skills_required.name: AWS
skills_required.description: Proficiency in Amazon Bedrock and using the Bedrock Runtime for model interaction.

skills_required.name: OCR
skills_required.description: Familiarity with OCR processes, especially with LLMs for text extraction from images.

skills_required.name: Large Language Models
skills_required.description: Expertise in working with LLMs like Claude 3 Haiku for text interpretation and processing.

skills_required.name: Python Programming
skills_required.description: Skilled in Python for automating image encoding, model interaction, and processing responses.

skills_required.name: Error Handling and Debugging
skills_required.description: Ability to implement error handling for incomplete or erroneous model responses.

skills_required.name: Unicode Handling
skills_required.description: Experience with character mapping for non-ASCII characters (e.g., Turkish special characters) and custom functions for Unicode correction.

skills_required.name: JSON Manipulation
skills_required.description: Strong skills in reading and writing JSON files, as well as formatting and manipulating JSON data.

challenges_faced.name: Model Parsing
challenges_faced.description: Ensuring correct parsing of images into structured data by the models.

challenges_faced.name: Unicode Handling
challenges_faced.description: Handling Turkish special characters by replacing Unicode escape sequences.

challenges_faced.name: Error Handling
challenges_faced.description: Implementing robust error handling for incomplete or faulty responses.

outcomes.name: Structured JSON Output
outcomes.description: Successfully structured menu data in JSON format, including Turkish characters handling.

outcomes.name: Error Logs
outcomes.description: Created error logs for incomplete model responses and handled the processing of raw data.
